SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
The Activity class represents an activity that can be booked by passengers.
ActivityInterface
The ActivityInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides additional methods related to activities within a travel package.
AddActivity
The AddActivity class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to add activities to a package.
AddDestination
The AddDestination class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to add destinations to a package.
AddPassenger
The AddPassenger class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to add passengers to a package.
AdjustBalance
The AdjustBalance class implements the PassengerInterface and provides methods to adjust the balance of a passenger based on certain actions and activities.
AvailableActivities
The AvailableActivities class implements the DestinationInterface and provides methods to retrieve available activities within a destination.
CheckActivity
The CheckActivity class implements the DestinationInterface and provides methods to check the presence of an activity in a destination.
CheckBalSufficient
The CheckBalSufficient class implements the PassengerInterface and provides a method to check if a passenger's balance is sufficient for a given activity.
Destination
The Destination class represents a destination with its associated activities.
DestinationInterface
The DestinationInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides additional methods related to destinations within a travel package.
DestinationPresent
The DestinationPresent class implements the PackageInterface and provides functionality to check if a destination is already present in the package's itinerary.
EnrollPassenger
The EnrollPassenger class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to enroll passengers into activities within a package.
GetPassenger
The GetPassenger class implements the PackageInterface and provides functionality to retrieve details of a specific passenger from a package.
NewActivity
The NewActivity class implements the DestinationInterface and provides methods to perform operations related to activities in a destination.
Package
The Package class represents a travel package containing information about its name, capacity, passengers, and itinerary.
PackageInterface
The PackageInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides methods to manage packages including adding passengers, activities, destinations, enrolling passengers in activities, and printing itinerary details.
ParentActivity
 
ParentDestination
 
ParentPackage
 
ParentPassenger
 
Passenger
The Passenger class represents a passenger with their name, number, membership status, and balance.
Passenger_optOut
The Passenger_optOut class implements the PackageInterface and provides functionality to remove a passenger from a specific activity within a package and adjust their balance accordingly.
PassengerFind
The PassengerFind class implements the ActivityInterface and provides methods to find a passenger within an activity and print details of an activity.
PassengerInterface
The PassengerInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides additional methods related to passengers within a travel package.
PrintActivity
The PrintActivity class implements the ActivityInterface and provides a method to print details of an activity.
PrintActivityDetails
The PrintActivityDetails class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to print details of activities within a package.
PrintAvailableActivities
The PrintAvailableActivities class implements the PackageInterface and provides a method to print details of available activities within a package.
PrintDestination
The PrintDestination class implements the DestinationInterface and provides a method to print details of activities available in a destination.
PrintIteneary
The PrintIteneary class implements the PackageInterface and provides a method to print the itinerary of a package.
PrintPassenger
The PrintPassenger class implements the PassengerInterface and provides a method to print details of a passenger and their enrolled activities.
PrintPassenger_package
The PrintPassenger_package class implements the PackageInterface and provides methods to print details of passengers within a package.
PrintPassengerList
The PrintPassengerList class implements the PackageInterface and provides a method to print the list of passengers within a package.
TravelPackage
Parent interface of all other subinterfaces
